00022 W.AnyBox = function(tag){var self = this;
00023     this.body = document.createElement('div');
00024     this.core = document.createElement(tag);
00025     // if the core itself is a visible widget, we need to append it to the body
00026     this.body.appendChild(this.core);
00027     W.style(this.core, '|width:100%;height:100%');
00028     W.event(window, 'onload', addWidget);
00029 
00030     function addWidget(){
00031         // register this instance to WPS
00032         W.add(self);
00033     };
00034 };
